mapper.insert: insert into premium_member values(#{PCD_PAY_OID},#{PCD_PAYER_NAME},date_add(now(),interval 1 month),date_sub(date_add(now(),interval 1 month),interval 1 day))
insert into premium_order values(#{PCD_PAY_OID},#{PCD_PAYER_NAME},now(),date_add(now(),interval 1 month),date_sub(date_add(now(),interval 1 month),interval 1 day),#{PCD_PAYER_ID})
mapper.select: select id from bcc_member where id=#{id}
select tel from bcc_member where id=#{id}
select email from bcc_member where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from premium_member where license_deadline = curdate()
mapper.update: update premium_order set create_date = now(), license_deadline = date_add(now(),interval 1 month), next_order_date = date_sub(date_add(now(),interval 1 month),interval 1 day) where next_order_date = curdate()
update premium_member set license_deadline = date_add(now(),interval 1 month), next_order_date = date_sub(date_add(now(),interval 1 month),interval 1 day) where next_order_date = curdate()
